-- Always replace semicolon (;) by comma (,) if inside double quotes

-- Finally replace all quotes ('') in the new file row by a single quote (')
... always delete leading and trailing double quotes if exists (because of
importing a hole file row these double quotes are note auto. eliminated
by Magic) e.g. also strings like this " " " WEBA " " " (3 leading/trailing
double qoutes) are possible and this could not be handled by Magic
if we import separate fields separated by delimiters as done e.g. in the
programs to import new debtors, invoices and ...
... increase client number to be 5 digits

.. in case of only zeros set column to blank
... column V has to be updated with column W
... column W has to be updated with 0
... column AB has to be updated with 'N'
.. in case of only zeros set column to blank
... column BU has to be updated with column BV
... column BV has to be updated with blank
